name: Dark Creation (Skill Card)
text:
Yubel / Skill
[ACTIVATION]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
[EFFECT]
Once per Duel, during your Main Phase, if you have 5 or more DARK monsters in your GY with different names and control no monsters, you can banish 1 DARK monster from your GY then Special Summon 1 DARK monster from your GY.
